AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: rescued Oni
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was kidnapped and enslaved, working in a dark hilly mine after refusing [PAWN_possessive] new masters advances. Kept at the brink of starvation - until a wandering band of travelers (perhaps just looking to loot the settlement) freed [PAWN_objective] from [PAWN_possessive] bonds. Since then, [PAWN_pronoun] has grown very fond of cooking meals, and still retains a good skill with a pickaxe.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: runaway Oni slave
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was captured by slavers and sold to a lecherous tycoon. [PAWN_pronoun] was forced to tend the gardens, and do all sorts of lewd acts for [PAWN_possessive] 'owner', but grew accustomed to the otherwise lavish environment. However eventually [PAWN_pronoun] grew to hate the lack of control and escaped on a garbage barge.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: enslaved Oni
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was captured by slavers. Being sold to numerous masters, [PAWN_nameDef] has lost the will to escape and learned absolute obedience to avoid brutal punishments.
